content: expand on 2 by creating a 12 week content calendar outline with 2 videos per week that are also converted into a blog each. Include micro content such as "short" videos such as "youtube shorts", instagram reels and tik tok videos. be detailed as to how often to email, include how to build a strong email list with lead magnets, too. include a plan for converting video into blog, into email and how to turn already created content into lead magnets that convert highly. Prioritize expert and uncommon advice.
